headline: Teledyne MEMS Welcomes Strategic Investment in C2MI
summary: BROMONT, Quebec, December 01, 2025--Teledyne Technologies Incorporated (NYSE:TDY) ("Teledyne") announced today that Teledyne MEMS, a founding member and partner of the MiQro Innovation Collaborative Center (C2MI), is proud to acknowledge the Canadian and Quebec governments’ strategic investment in its expansion into the next project phase, C2MI1.5. The C$656 million investment announced today marks a milestone in strengthening Canada’s semiconductor and microelectronics ecosystem.
